about.title: About Us
about.description: BookBed is a booking management platform that helps vacation rental owners efficiently manage their business.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Our mission is to simplify booking management and help property owners focus their time on what matters most - providing an excellent experience for their guests.
mission.description2: Through innovative technology and a simple user experience, BookBed transforms how vacation rental owners manage their bookings.

fast.title: Fast & Simple
fast.desc: Intuitive user experience that saves time

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: Your data is protected and secure

team.title: Team Approach
team.desc: We work together with you for success

hero.title: Manage All Your Bookings in One Place
hero.subtitle: The complete booking management platform for vacation rental owners

cards.bookedMessage: Marko P. booked Apartman A2 for Dec 20-25

features.title: Everything You Need
features.subtitle: Powerful features to streamline your rental business

calendar.title: Timeline Calendar
calendar.desc: Visual timeline view with drag-and-drop booking management and turnover detection

widget.title: Unit Hub
widget.desc: Centralized property management with unit details, pricing, and availability settings

analytics.title: Booking Management
analytics.desc: Track all reservations with status updates, guest details, and payment history

payments.title: Stripe Payments
payments.desc: Secure checkout with automatic tracking and refund management

emails.title: Automated Emails
emails.desc: Booking confirmations, check-in reminders, and payment notifications

ical.title: iCal Sync
ical.desc: Two-way sync with Airbnb, Booking.com, and other platforms

screenshots.title: See It In Action
screenshots.subtitle: A beautiful, intuitive interface for managing your properties

gallery.title: See It In Action
gallery.subtitle: Beautiful, intuitive interface designed for property owners

cta.title: Ready to Simplify Your Bookings?
cta.subtitle: Start managing your vacation rentals the easy way

demo.title: See BookBed in Action
demo.subtitle: Watch how easy it is to manage your vacation rentals
demo.ctaDesc: Try BookBed free and see how easy it is to manage your bookings.

video1.title: Widget Booking Flow
video1.desc: See how guests can easily book through your embedded widget with Stripe payments

video2.title: Property & Unit Setup
video2.desc: Create properties, add units, set pricing, and publish with the setup wizard

video3.title: Booking Management
video3.desc: Approve, reject, or cancel bookings with the intuitive timeline calendar

video4.title: Integrations
video4.desc: Set up iCal sync, connect Stripe, configure custom subdomain, and embed widgets

video5.title: Analytics & Reports
video5.desc: Track revenue, occupancy rates, and booking trends with detailed analytics dashboard

widget.title: Embeddable Booking Widget
widget.subtitle: Add booking functionality to your website in minutes

mode1.title: Full Booking Mode
mode1.desc: Complete booking flow with Stripe payment integration

mode2.title: Calendar Only Mode
mode2.desc: Display availability without booking - perfect for inquiry-based rentals

mode3.title: Inquiry Mode
mode3.desc: Allow guests to send booking inquiries without immediate payment
